backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme CSS variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App router configuration defining all routes and rendering Layout via TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/AddChapterDialog: Dialog component allowing users to add a new chapter with name, lecture count, and duration.
frontend/src/components/BottomNavigation: Mobile-friendly bottom navigation bar with subject tabs and links to home, calendar, tests, and customize.
frontend/src/components/ChapterCard.tsx: Displays a chapter card with status, lecture info, elapsed time, and start/stop working controls.
frontend/src/components/ChapterDetailPan: Shows detailed chapter info in a side panel, including target hours, finish date, and status update actions.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the main app layout with header, navigation, customization panel, and routed content area.
frontend/src/components/MonthGridCalenda: Renders a navigable monthly calendar grid with selectable dates and optional day indicators.
Provides a resource list for a subject with add and delete functionality inside a sidebar card.
frontend/src/components/TasksDrawer.tsx: Implements a slide-out menu with navigation and subject-specific task management including add, toggle, and delete.
frontend/src/components/TestScoreChart.t: Renders a score chart for a test, building an SVG line or bar chart from sorted score data.
frontend/src/components/TodoList.tsx: Displays a subject-specific todo list with add, toggle, and delete actions using useTodos.
frontend/src/customization/applyDarkMode: Applies light or dark mode to the document root based on override settings.
frontend/src/customization/Customization: Provides a small settings button that triggers opening the customization panel.
Shows a settings panel with sliders, inputs, and toggles to adjust study customization preferences.
Context provider managing customization settings, draft settings, and dark mode overrides.
frontend/src/customization/integration.t: Utility functions for notifications, sleep-window checks, card density, target-hour calculation, and finish-date estimation.
frontend/src/customization/settingsModel: Defines customization settings, defaults, and a validator to sanitize updates.
frontend/src/customization/useCustomizat: Manages saving, loading, applying, and deleting user-defined customization presets in localStorage.
Loads, updates, validates, and persists customization settings with reset support.
frontend/src/data/chapters.ts: Exports chapter definitions and initial chapter list with metadata for multiple subjects.
frontend/src/data/subjects.ts: Defines subject types, default subjects, and legacy route/name mappings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCalendarEntries.ts: Manages calendar entries with localStorage persistence and CRUD operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useChapterData.ts: Loads, migrates, and stores chapter data with versioning and supports adding and updating chapters.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentlyWorkingCh: Tracks currently active chapters with timers and persists state in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardNote.ts: Stores and updates a single dashboard note in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardTitle.ts: Manages a customizable dashboard title with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, login handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotes.ts: Manages a list of notes with add, update, and delete operations stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Stub for backend React Query hooks, exposing the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useResources.ts: Loads, migrates, and stores subject-specific resources with add/delete support and default fallbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useStudyLog.ts: Manages study log entries in localStorage, allowing adding hours with optional sleep-window notifications and computing today’s total hours.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubjects.ts: Loads, stores, and manages subjects with versioned localStorage, supporting adding subjects and lookups by id or name.
frontend/src/hooks/useTests.ts: Handles creation and management of tests and score entries using versioned localStorage, including chart settings updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useTodos.ts: Manages subject-specific todos with migration from legacy formats and synchronized versioned storage.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base, component, and utility layers with light/dark theme CSS variables and responsive container rules.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a utility function to merge Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/CalendarDashboard.tsx: Implements a calendar dashboard with month navigation and daily work-item CRUD using custom calendar entry hooks.
frontend/src/pages/Customize.tsx: Provides a customization UI for settings, presets, preview modes, and subject management with form handling and toasts.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with chapter stats, countdown timer, active chapter timers, subject creation, and editable title/note fields.
frontend/src/pages/Notes.tsx: Provides a notes interface with creation, editing, deletion, and list browsing using local note persistence.
frontend/src/pages/SubjectPage.tsx: Displays a subject’s chapters, todos, and resources with chapter timers, detail panels, and chapter creation.
frontend/src/pages/Tests.tsx: Implements test management including creating tests, recording/editing scores, and viewing charts with customizable colors.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup for the project.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, architecture notes, existing features, and known issues for build planning.
